column2:
"Hm, nothing around here... Oh! Hey, partner!
What brings you out here?"

"Me, I'm here on work. Just your average scouting
mission."

"Still paying my dues, I guess. You've gotta put in
the hours and show some results before they let
you go racing off to crazy new planets."

"Apparently one really huge kill can do it,
but let's be honest here,
that's not likely to happen with me.
I'll stick to doing the safe stuff, bit by bit."

"It'll take a lot less time than it did getting
into ARKS, so you won't hear me complain.
I should probably get back to it though!"

"んー……このあたりは気配なし、っと
おっ、相棒！　どうしたよ！"

"おれ？　おれは任務中だよ。
カンタンな偵察任務。"

"いわゆる下積み、ってやつ？
いろいろやって、認められないと
いろんな惑星に行く許可が出ないだろ？"

"ハデな戦果があれば一発許可らしいけど
おれにはちょっとキビしいからな。
手頃な任務を地道にやってくよ。"

"それでも、アークスになるまで
かかった時間よりは短いし、十分だ。
へへっ、んじゃな！"
